name: Tichu Counter
description:
Tichu Counter is an app that helps tracking and calculating the score while playing Tichu in real-life.

- Keep track of current game score
- Handle all variations of successful and failed Tichus
- Keep a database of statistics for all players
- Keep a history of all the games you played
- Save a game in progress, play a different game, and then come back and finish the first.

Contact us

If you have any questions about Tichu Counter or feature requests please send us an email to support@krtlivapps.com and we will do our best to add it in the next version.
